fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
During the day, you may guess someoneâ€™s role when they are on the stand, you may only do this twice.

If you successfully get the role, your target will be notified.

A wrongful role guess will make your blowgun backfire onto you.

A guessed target will die to infection after two days by an unstoppable attack.

A Doctor or Guardian Angel can heal a guessed target, a Potion Master cannot.

After the first night, your targets infection will leave them voiceless.
